mapper.select: select rno, bno, replyer, replytext, to_char(regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss') as regdate from reply where bno=#{bno} order by rno desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply values (reply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, sysdate, sysdate, null)
mapper.update: update reply set replytext=#{replytext}, updatedate = sysdate where rno=#{rno}
